basic_data.name: M1
basic_data.additional_name: Material for machining: Steel, Stainless steel, Aluminum, Cast iron, Non-ferrous metals, Plastic
basic_data.description: Thanks to its innovative design and advanced technologies, the M1 series machines are valued for their high-quality workmanship and ability to flexibly adapt to various production tasks.

parameters.name: Max. width of the machined workpiece
Max. height of the machined workpiece

main_characteristics.title: Exceptional rigidity ensuring efficient machining and high surface quality
content: Thanks to its exceptional rigidity, our M1 machine enables not only efficient machining but also ensures high surface quality. This unique feature guarantees the stability of the machining process, resulting in excellent production outcomes and precise details without compromises.

main_characteristics.title: Inline spindle design with extensive global experience
content: Our proven inline spindle design, with over 3,000 units installed worldwide, stands for reliability and long-term efficiency. Thanks to the high thermal capacity of the components, our machine guarantees thermal stability, which is crucial for maintaining precision and quality during the machining process.

main_characteristics.title: Optimized working space
content: Our machine offers an optimized working space combined with a compact design, enabling efficient machining even in limited installation areas. The table, measuring 850 x 650 mm with a maximum load capacity of 600 kg, features high rigidity, ensuring stability and precision during the machining process.

specification.name: Easy leveling
param: On 3 feet + 2 additional feet to increase the machine's dynamic rigidity
